Articles.Content:
I got my key bindings all fouled up and would like to start over but I can't seem to find an easy way to restore them to their default all at once is there an easy way?

Edited February 11, 2014 by kBob

Deleting your settings.cfg file and letting the game generate a new one next time you started it would work, but it would also get rid of your other settings (e.g. Graphics).

You could possibly note down, or copy out all of the non-keybinding settings, delete, restart, and paste them back in.
I was going to switch back and forth between my clean KSP and the one I use, but deleting the cfg sounds easier I was going to change a few things anyway, thank you.
